backend/main.mo: Defines core workout, user profile, recovery tracking types, stable state, and constants for exercise libraries and muscle group limits in a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for build reference or documentation.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Documentation-only file used to trigger a rebuild after a failed deployment, with no code changes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the PWA including meta tags, manifest links, Apple splash screens, and script bootstrap.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, and theme settings for Gym Tracker.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, page routing, workout validation, splash screen, and lazy-loaded pages.
Modal for updating and validating user bodyweight and unit, integrating profile update mutations and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with page switching, haptic feedback, and settings modal activation.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Modal for selecting and recording alternative exercises, showing options and handling API mutation and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app branding, test mode badge, settings button, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Implements a custom touch-based pull-to-refresh wrapper with animated indicator and refresh triggering logic.
Displays muscle recovery status using API data with loading skeletons, color coding, and optional weighted leg averages.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: User settings modal allowing profile updates, dark mode toggling, validation, and saving via API mutations.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Full‑screen splash screen showing logo and branding animations during app startup.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Compact status bar showing workout streak and current date.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: Modal for sharing workouts via QR code, link copying, or native share API with loading and feedback states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identities, login state, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions with helpers for error handling, auth checks, and workout validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Implements a wake lock hook that requests, maintains, and releases screen wake locks with auto-reacquisition and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet enforcing dark mode, theme variables, typography, safe areas, and mobile optimizations.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Utility functions to save, load, clear, and validate persisted workout session state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Utilities for converting, validating, and formatting backend BigInt timestamps into usable dates and formatted strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays workout history, recovery data, and user stats with refresh actions and lazy‑loaded components.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows workout history with formatted timestamps and a training calendar, supporting pull‑to‑refresh.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: Generates new workouts based on selected type, calling backend generators and returning results to the parent.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects initial user profile data and saves it via backend mutation with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays muscle recovery and weekly volume data with refresh support and visual indicators for each muscle group.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Validates and displays a generated workout, allowing regeneration and exercise replacement before starting a session.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Manages an active workout session with set logging, timers, exercise changes, PR detection, and session persistence.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines frontend types for exercises, workouts, recovery states, volume, and set configurations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, sizes, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains project state metadata and requirements to fix backend lower-body workout note logic and update frontend to render a Core subsection after leg groups.
